description:
Nova is allowed to run kill as root, to be allowed to stop/restart dnsmasq and radvd.
We should restrict what we allow the nova user to do as root to the strict minimum.
title: Better filter around running kill as root

comments.content:
Nova is allowed to run kill as root, to be allowed to stop/restart dnsmasq and radvd.
We should restrict what we allow the nova user to do as root to the strict minimum.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content: It would be really nice if nova could be launched without any root privileges.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zyluo

comments.content: Nova is already launched without any root privileges. But the nova user is allowed to call a set of commands as root. For more explanation see http://fnords.wordpress.com/2011/11/23/improving-nova-privilege-escalation-model-part-1/ and subsequent posts in this series.

    Add a specific filter for kill commands

    This implementation checks the signals and the executables
    actually affected, using procfs. Fixes bug 918226.
